# nith-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description            | Type                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of the button | `"default" \| "primary"` | `'default'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                 | Description                                      |
| ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `--button-border-radius`             | Border Radius of the button                      |
| `--button-default-active-box-shadow` | Box shadow of the default button in active state |
| `--button-default-background`        | Background of the default button                 |
| `--button-default-color`             | Color of the default button                      |
| `--button-default-focus-box-shadow`  | Box shadow of the default button in focus state  |
| `--button-default-hover-box-shadow`  | Box shadow of default button in hover state      |
| `--button-font-size`                 | Font size of text in the button                  |
| `--button-height`                    | Height of the button                             |
| `--button-padding`                   | Padding of the button                            |
| `--button-primary-active-box-shadow` | Box shadow of the primary button in active state |
| `--button-primary-background`        | Background of the primary button                 |
| `--button-primary-color`             | Color of the primary button                      |
| `--button-primary-focus-box-shadow`  | Box shadow of the primary button in focus state  |
| `--button-primary-hover-box-shadow`  | Box shadow of primary button in hover state      |
| `--button-transition`                | Transition to apply to the button                |
